body_html:
I got the quantized ops to work on windows. A branch with the changes is here:
https://github.com/guschmue/tensorflow/tree/win-quant
I made as little changes as possible to gemmlowp (basically for windows replace pthread with stl threads) to increase chances that I get a pull request taken.
Unit tests for quantized ops on windows are passing.

I still need to make it build with bazel/windows and should be able to send a pr in the next few days.

body:
I got the quantized ops to work on windows. A branch with the changes is here: 
https://github.com/guschmue/tensorflow/tree/win-quant
I made as little changes as possible to gemmlowp (basically for windows replace pthread with stl threads) to increase chances that I get a pull request taken.
Unit tests for quantized ops on windows are passing.

I still need to make it build with bazel/windows and should be able to send a pr in the next few days.
